We make kitchen counter tops, vanity tops, tub surrounds, decks, fireplaces, table tops, bar tops, reception desks, and more - virtually any item your project requires.

profile:
From the year 1989 Brampton Kitchen & Cabinets Ltd. has been designing and manufacturing Custom Cabinetry, with Custom Kitchens being its flagship service. Brampton Kitchen follows a set of ethical values and professional procedures. We operate with the highest level of integrity and rigidly adhere to the policy of customer service, accountability and skill. We are a credible organization that stands behind its product. 
Extensive experience of several years and expertise of best artisans and craftsmen, we create designs that stand out. Be it your Kitchen, Bathroom, Vanity, Entertainment Unit, Bar or Walk-in Closet we have the skills to meet your every need. Our thorough knowledge of our trade is our biggest asset. We learn about your lifestyle while working alongside with you, so as to tailor your kitchen or cabinetry according to your specifications. From Planning to Designing to Manufacturing, we make sure you love every step along the way. We educate you about the industry, current trends and styles so that you make an informed decision.  We can turn your dream into reality without having to compromise on budget or quality.

profile:
Sinco granite is Toronto's leading granite countertop fabricator. We are a family run / operated business whose main goal is to keep 100% of our customers satisfied. 
Sinco is one of the largest granite countertop fabricator in Toronto with over 10,000 square foot facility. We are sure you will find something at our shop once you drop in. We have hundreds of slabs in stock at all times which can be viewed by our clients. We will be more than happy to personally assist every client and answer any questions they might have. 
Your referral is our best compliment. With our state of the art equipment, we ensure all our customers will be completely satisfied with our services and quality of craftsmanship. Give us a shot at your residential or commercial project, we are sure you will come back for more!

profile:
Marble Granite Countertops Inc. (MGC Inc.) has the capabilities to meet your aesthetic and design needs. Our assets lie in more than 15 years of experience and skills which our staff brings to the table, resulting in a high quality product delivered on time. We work with designers, architects and home builders to accommodate residential and commercial applications. We also specialize in working with a variety of stones such as Granite, Marble, Limestone, Quartz, Slate and more.
 
Our fabrication facility has all the tools and equipment required to guarantee a product of excellent quality and during fabrication quality control measures are in place to ensure that anything that leaves our facility has been thoroughly reviewed by a full time on-site supervisor. Whether your project is a kitchen counter-top, vanity, tub surrounding, fire place, or custom piece, our goal is to ensure 100% satisfaction on any finished product.

profile:
Upgrade Countertop & Stone supplies and installs custom cut quartz, granite, marble and all other natural stone counters .
 
All our workers have more then 10 years nature stone fabrication experience. We co-work with lots of stone suppliers such as Caesarstone, Silestone, Samsung, Hanstone, Interstone, etc in Toronto.We are fully licensed and insured and will provide you with a written contract, so there's no surprises!

We do both commercial and residential countertop projects.

Contact or Visit our factory at 271 Amber St, Unit 8 in Markham, ON to get professional suggestion.

Send your drawing to us or call us at 905-513-0868 to get the free quotation.

When we start the project, we will go and template your counter again. This process will last 45min-1hour.

After template and slab arrives, we need 4-5 business days fabrication. Guaranteed!! 

Installation will take 3-4 hours. It depends on the size of your project.

We also provide old countertop removal and disposal service. If you need us to do this , please let us know before installation.

**Factory direct, best price and fast delivery and installation

-Professional fabrication and installation team

profile:
The Stone Solution specializes in the supply, fabrication and installation of marble, granite, quartz, quartzite and more! Whether it's countertops, fireplace mantels or hearths, shower jambs, or a custom project altogether - we're ready to tackle anything from complex and large scale construction projects to minor repair jobs.
 
We are fuelled by our commitment to excellence and go the extra mile to make it easy for our clients to be fully satisfied with our workmanship, price, and timeline.
 
Get in touch with us today for a free consultation!

We're social here: 
https://www.facebook.com/thestonesolutions
https://www.instagram.com/thestonesolution/
services:
No matter the size of the project, we take pride in our excellent work, competitive fees and our ability to deliver outstanding results on time - every time. From coordinating projects to taking care of chip repairs, we conveniently guide our clients through all of our services.
​
Whether it's marble, granite or quartz, our complete list of services include the supply, fabrication and installation of:

- Kitchen Countertops
- Vanity Countertops
- Fireplace Mantels and Hearths
- Shower Jambs and Niches
- Marble Walls
- Custom Projects
- Chip Repairs
